job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to generate code and evaluating their output, rather than building, training, or deploying AI models. It emphasizes human feedback and interaction with AI as a user, aligning more with productivity enhancement than core AI engineering roles.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'train AI models' directly relates to the process of developing and refining machine learning models, which falls under the Modeling category.
Similar to 'train AI models', this phrase indicates involvement in the model training process, a core aspect of the Modeling task.
This phrase explicitly mentions training generative AI models, which is a specific type of modeling activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
job_tasks.justification: This describes a method of providing data or feedback to train AI models, which is a form of indirect involvement in the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking model outputs is a crucial part of the model development lifecycle, often used for fine-tuning or assessing performance, thus falling under Modeling.

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
soft_skills.justification: This implies that the role is open to individuals who can learn and adapt to working with AI models, even without prior experience.
This suggests a need for individuals with a solid foundation in software engineering who can potentially take initiative and ownership in their tasks.
The act of crafting and answering questions implies a need for clear communication and the ability to articulate concepts, even if in the context of training AI.
